TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlMembersMapping extends System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping

summary.span: 提供 .NET Framework Web 服务方法与为 SOAP Web 服务定义的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 消息之间的映射。

span.span: Provides mappings between .NET Framework Web service methods and Web Services Description Language (WSDL) messages that are defined for SOAP Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不直接使用。The class is not used directly. 相反，它使用：Instead, it is used: - 由 Wsdl.exe 工具或类，而从 WSDL 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象的服务器类。By the Wsdl.exe tool, or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document. WSDL 文档指定使用 SOAP 协议。The WSDL document specifies use of the SOAP protocol. - 若要初始化对象时.NET Framework 正在初始化 SOAP Web 服务或客户端。To initialize objects while the .NET Framework is initializing a SOAP Web service or client. - 通过类在创建时从标识为 SOAP Web 服务的类的对象。By the class while creating objects from classes that are identified as SOAP Web services. 类是一个替代Web 服务方法和消息之间进行映射的类。The class is a substitute for the class for mapping between Web service methods and messages. 它用于包含任何属于 SOAP Web 服务方法的以下实体：It is used to contain any of the following entities belonging to a SOAP Web service method: - 输入的参数。Input parameters. - 输出参数和返回值。Output parameters and return value. - 请求 SOAP 标头。Request SOAP headers. - 响应 SOAP 标头。Response SOAP headers. 具体而言，此类表示映射的 WSDL 消息定义，根据以下选择：Specifically, the class represents mappings for a WSDL message definition, according to the following choices: - 使用 SOAP 编码的 Web 服务方法： 顶级和属性与父级，包装元素; 由数组成员表示的消息部分。For a Web service method that uses SOAP encoding: The top-level and properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the message parts are represented by array members. 但是，在极少数情况下的 Web 服务操作使用文档样式与.NET Framework 方法和 SOAP 编码，顶层的已包装绑定结合使用时和属性与单个**一部分**显示生成的 WSDL 文档中的元素。However, in the rare case when the Web service operation uses document style combined with a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method plus SOAP encoding, the top-level and properties pertain to the single **part** element that appears in a generated WSDL document. - 对于 Web 服务使文本的方法使用 XML 架构定义的： 如果 Web 服务消息或操作使用已包装的绑定到.NET Framework 方法或只是定义的单个消息部分的顶级和属性适用于该部件。For a Web service method that makes literal use of XML Schema definitions: If a Web service message or operation uses a wrapped binding to a .NET Framework method or merely defines a single message part, the top-level and properties pertain to the part. 如果有多个部分 （非典型情况），顶级和属性与父级，包装元素; 由表示部件和索引数组访问属性。If there are multiple parts (the atypical case), the top-level and properties pertain to a parent, wrapper element; the parts are represented by the and indexed array access properties. 此外，XSD`any`元素需要特殊处理。In addition, the XSD `any` element receives special treatment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 .NET Framework 代码实体的数目，这些实体属于 SOAP 消息所映射到的 Web 服务方法。

span.span: Gets the number of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method to which a SOAP message is being mapped.
The number of mappings in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以包含以下任何一项：The collection can contain of any of the following: - Web 服务方法输入的参数。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服务方法输出参数，加上 1 的返回类型，如果不是 void。Web service method output parameters, plus 1 for the return type, if not void. - SOAP 输入标头。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 输出标头。SOAP output headers. 请参阅类在其下这些实体将转换为的条件`part`Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的元素。See the class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As XmlMemberMapping

span.span: The index of the mapping to return.

summary.span: 获取一项，该项包含 .NET Framework 代码实体的内部类型映射信息，而 .NET Framework 代码实体属于映射到 SOAP 消息的 Web 服务方法。

span.span: Gets an item that contains internal type mapping information for a .NET Framework code entity that belongs to a Web service method being mapped to a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关索引的阵列访问运算符类从以下任一的数组中获取指定的项：The indexed array access operator for the class gets a specified entry from an array of any of the following: - Web 服务方法输入的参数。Web service method input parameters. - Web 服务方法输出参数，以及返回类型，如果不是 void 索引 0 处。Web service method output parameters, plus the return type, if not void, at index 0. - SOAP 输入标头。SOAP input headers. - SOAP 输出标头。SOAP output headers. 请参阅类在其下这些实体将转换为的条件`part`Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的元素。See the class for the conditions under which these entities translate to `part` elements in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 .NET Framework 类型的名称，该类型映射到表示 SOAP 消息的 XML 架构元素的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the name of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.
The name of the .NET Framework type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 消息定义在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中使用`message`元素。A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element. 请参阅依据的条件的类属性是指在 Web 服务方法 （参数或返回值） 中定义而不是，额外父或包装元素的代码实体。See the class for the conditions under which the property refers to a code entity defined in a Web service method (a parameter or return value) instead of to an extra parent or wrapper element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 .NET Framework 类型的命名空间，该类型映射到表示 SOAP 消息的 XML 架构元素的数据类型。

span.span: Gets the namespace of the .NET Framework type being mapped to the data type of an XML Schema element that represents a SOAP message.

value.span: 映射的 .NET Framework 命名空间。

span.span: The .NET Framework namespace of the mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 消息定义在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中使用`message`元素。A SOAP message is defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document using the `message` element.
